RelatedSentence: WASHINGTON DC - New central bank governor John Mangudya failed to appear before a parliamentary committee on Monday , leaving some lawmakers furious as the Zimbabwe economy continues to decline .
Finance and budget committee member , Willas Madzimure , says Mangudya apologized to the committee saying he is currently attending an international event .
